Learn more about Bowl 360 Strike City Spring Hill Price $ Hours Monday-Thursday, Sunday: 10AM-12AM Friday-Saturday: 10AM-2AM Bowl 360 Strike City Spring Hill is an exciting entertainment venue that integrates bowling, arcade games, and sports viewing into a state-of-the-art facility. Since its establishment in 2016 in the heart of Spring Hill, this innovative bowling center boasts 32 modern lanes, complete with automatic bumpers and scoring, catering to bowlers of all skill levels. Not just a bowling destination, it also offers an ultra-modern arcade filled with the latest gaming options. Guests can relax and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere while watching live sports and music videos on large screens throughout the venue. The in-house DJ ensures a lively ambiance, spinning popular tracks for all to enjoy. From glow-in-the-dark bowling to themed parties, corporate events, and family outings, Bowl 360 provides endless entertainment options. Whether it's a casual get-together with friends, a fun family day, or a night out with a special someone, this venue creates a memorable experience with quality service and dining options at its Uptown Bar & Grill. Store manager Anthony Wiegand loves helping customers and truly enjoys what he does, finding it awesome to see someone smile after assisting them with all their bowling needs. Whether you‚Äôre shopping for your first bowling ball or seeking the latest high-performance equipment for competitive play, our Spring Hill pro shop has everything you need. We carry top brands including Storm Bowling, Hammer, Epic Bowling, Brunswick, and SWAG, ensuring you have access to the best bowling equipment available. Anthony specializes in providing comprehensive service from general knowledge and equipment purchases to coaching ‚Äì it‚Äôs truly a great honor to serve Hernando County bowlers! Professional Services & Expertise Custom Ball Fitting State-of-the-art milling machines deliver accuracy within one thousandth of an inch. Custom oval holes for perfect fit. Equipment Maintenance Oil removal, resurfacing, sanding, and polishing services to keep your equipment performing at its peak. USBC Certified Coaching Personalized lessons for all skill levels ‚Äì from beginners to professional bowlers looking to improve your game. Comprehensive Service Anthony provides complete assistance with general knowledge, equipment purchases, and coaching for all your bowling needs. Why Choose BowlersMart Spring Hill? üé≥ Passionate Service: Anthony Wiegand truly enjoys helping customers and finds it awesome to see bowlers smile after receiving expert assistance with all their needs. üè¢ Recently Remodeled: Professional pro shop services inside Spring Hill Lanes‚Äô newly renovated 44-lane entertainment center in Hernando County. ‚öôÔ∏è Precision Service: State-of-the-art equipment ensures perfect fits and professional-quality work for optimal performance. üöÄ Competitive Advantage: Comprehensive service from equipment to coaching gives you the edge in leagues and tournaments throughout Hernando County. Shop Top Bowling Equipment Categories Shop Bowling Balls Shop Bowling Bags Premier Spring Hill & Hernando County Bowling Pro Shop ‚Äì Expert Services & Equipment BowlersMart Spring Hill is the premier bowling pro shop serving Hernando County with professional bowling equipment and expert services. Located conveniently inside Spring Hill Lanes, we‚Äôre your trusted one-stop bowling shop for all bowling needs in Spring Hill, Brooksville, Weeki Wachee, and surrounding Central Florida communities including New Port Richey, Hudson, and Holiday. Our extensive bowling ball selection features the latest releases from industry-leading manufacturers including Storm Bowling, Hammer, Epic Bowling, Brunswick, and SWAG. From entry-level polyester bowling balls for beginners to high-performance reactive resin balls for advanced players, we stock bowling balls for every skill level and playing style. Our professional bowling ball drilling services ensure perfect fit and optimal performance.
